entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Controller for HomeKit
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫579,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.499,99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Kingdom Rush Frontiers TD
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • BonehartÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99
  • AshbiteÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99
  • DanteÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99
  • Sha'traÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99
  • GrawlÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99
  • KutsaoÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit. Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp. BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS! ‚Ä¢ OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. ‚Ä¢ UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. ‚Ä¢ Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld! TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES ‚Ä¢ 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies! ‚Ä¢ Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! DEFEAT THEM ALL ‚Ä¢ OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before! ‚Ä¢ MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT ‚Ä¢ Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements! ‚Ä¢ IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up! ‚Ä¢ CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills! ‚Ä¢ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! ‚Ä¢ PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline! ----------------------------------------------------- PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5 Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Juice Watch
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Monitor your iPhone battery level from your wrist. Juice Watch is a simple app designed to do two things well: ‚Ä¢ Show the battery level of the paired iPhone in a complication on Apple Watch ‚Ä¢ Deliver a notification on your iPhone when your Apple Watch is charging and gets above 90% (or whatever level you choose, from 50% to 100%) Just glance at your wrist to monitor the charge of your iPhone throughout the day. Or, keep tabs on the battery level of your iPhone while it is plugged in and charging in another room. You can see both your iPhone and Apple Watch battery levels on the same complication. You can also get a notification on your Apple Watch when the paired iPhone is charging and reaches at least 80% (or whatever level you choose, from 50% to 100%). You can set up low battery notifications, to get notifications when your Apple Watch or iPhone battery is low. Juice Watch is available for a wide variety of complications, so you can use it on your favorite watch faces. You can also use this app to check your Apple Watch battery level from your paired iPhone. This can be useful while your Apple Watch is charging somewhere else. Keep in mind that the iPhone battery level shown on Apple Watch is not real-time. It is refreshed periodically, about every 5‚Äì60 minutes. The Apple Watch battery level shown on the paired iPhone refreshes at approximately the same rate. As of iOS 17 and watchOS 10, Juice Watch reports battery levels rounded to the nearest 5% since that's now the granularity that Apple makes available to apps.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: FocusDots ¬∑ Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
